text:
@realDonaldTrump @lgutwein99_31 Americans are sick, a hundred thousand are dead & 39 million are unemployed because you hid Covid-19 for five weeks to keep the stock market moving & refused to lead.

You're hyping the stock market again.  Your SUCKERS will soon learn a vaccine is a 2021/2022 reality, if that.
